posts.title: test
posts.text: Hexo 有两份主要的配置文件（_config.yml），一份位于站点根目录下，另一份位于主题目录下。为了描述方便，在以下说明中，将前者称为站点配置文件，后者称为主题配置文件 标题居中测试下载NexT主题 cd /usr/local/hexogit clone git://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next 若是https不行，就使用git://下载克隆，然后发现hexo/themes目录下多个Next的目录 修改站点配置文件修改站点配置文件_config.yml，找到以下部分12341 # Extensions2 ## Plugins: http://hexo.io/plugins/3 ## Themes: http://hexo.io/themes/4 theme: landscape 修改为123451 # Extensions2 ## Plugins: http://hexo.io/plugins/3 ## Themes: http://hexo.io/themes/4 # theme: landscape5 theme: next

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
